profile_summary: Embedded Linux expert with 11 years in developing firmware for networking devices. Skilled in kernel modules, bootloaders, and secure OTA mechanisms.

experience.title: Firmware Lead, NetBox AG; Frankfurt, Germany — 2016–Present
experience.summary: Developed secure boot process and modular kernel extensions for routers. Managed Yocto build system and signed OTA updates.

experience.title: Embedded Linux Engineer, LinkWave GmbH; Mainz, Germany — 2012–2016
experience.summary: Customized OpenWRT builds and built drivers for Wi-Fi chipsets. Designed UI interface integration layer via JSON-RPC.

experience.title: Junior Developer, ComLink UG; Darmstadt, Germany — 2010–2012
experience.summary: Maintained CLI-based firmware configuration tools and added IPv6 NAT support modules.
